KeyMechanics.Name: Request Assistance
KeyMechanics.Description: Summons additional imperial soldiers to the battle

KeyMechanics.Name: Magitek Cannon
KeyMechanics.Description: Circular AoE attack that targets a random player

KeyMechanics.Name: High-powered Magitek Ray
KeyMechanics.Description: Untelegraphed line attack that deals damage to all players directly in front of the boss.

KeyMechanics.Name: Thermobaric Strike
KeyMechanics.Description: Places a flare in a random corner of the arena doing damage the closer you are to it

KeyMechanics.Name: Hypercharge
KeyMechanics.Description: Repositions at the center of the arena and fires adonut AoE and circle AoE

KeyMechanics.Name: Overcharge
KeyMechanics.Description: A frontal cone AoE attack that deals heavy amount of damage and inflicts the debuff Paralysis

KeyMechanics.Name: Targeted Support
KeyMechanics.Description: Timed AoE ontop of all players

KeyMechanics.Name: Artificial Plasma
KeyMechanics.Description: Unavoidable raidwide damage that must be healed

KeyMechanics.Name: Roundhouse
KeyMechanics.Description: Reposition to the center of the Arena and casts a circle AoE followed by 8 AoEs on the border of the arena

KeyMechanics.Name: Infinite Reach
KeyMechanics.Description: Sequence of a large line AoE down the center of the arena followed by 6 circle AoEs on the sides of it, exploding in order of appearance

KeyMechanics.Name: Thermobaric Strike
KeyMechanics.Description: Casted in preparation of "Stunning Sweep" or "Angry Salamander"
